text:
@AOC Amazon can slow it down as well, @JeffBezos is a Billionaire, no one is going anywhere so next day or two day deliveries not required (unless medicine).

Balance is required in COVID-19 Times, all people need to be safe, healthy and cared for, not just people at home.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
